mapper.select: SELECT a.`cy_id`,a.`cy_name`,a.`cy_price`,a.`cy_sales`,c.`p_image` FROM `commodity` a,`cdetails` b,`product` c WHERE a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND b.`cs_id`=c.`cs_id` AND a.`cy_name`LIKE "%"#{cy_name}"%"

SELECT a.`cy_id`,a.`cy_name`,a.`cy_price`,a.`cy_sales`,c.`p_image` FROM `commodity` a,`cdetails` b,`product` c,`cdetails` d WHERE a.`cy_id`=d.`cy_id` AND a.`cy_id`=b.`cy_id` AND b.`cs_id`=c.`cs_id` AND d.`cs_size`=#{cs_size}
